creator: bill@sane.com
text:
Installing on XP, the license agreement I was asked to agree to during install was:

To add your 
own license text to this dialog, specify your license
agreement file in the Dialog editor.  


Navigate to the User Interface view.
Select the LicenseAgreement dialog.
Choose to 
edit the dialog layout. 
Once in the Dialog editor, select the Memo ScrollableText 
control.
Set FileName to the name of your license agreement RTF file. 

After you build your 
release, your license text will be displayed in the
License Agreement dialog.

The package 
downloaded was: apache_2.0.40-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text: I've pulled the broken installer.  We'll build a new one ASAP.  Thanks for the report.

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text: *** Bug 11638 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
The new installer is built and available from

  http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/

  Thank you for your report, and we regret the problems with the faulty
  original package.
